name: 王正豪
objective: 網路搜尋已經成為最受歡迎的應用之一. 資訊檢索主要在探討如何有效的在大量文字及多媒體文件中搜尋使用者想要的資訊. 本課程將介紹資訊檢索的基本觀念, 檢索模型, 文字資訊檢索, 檢索結果評估, 索引與搜尋, 以及其他多媒體檢索相關應用.
schedule:
Indexing (3 wks)
Basic text modeling and evaluation (2-3 wks)
Query processing and advanced models (2-3 wks)
Machine learning in IR (2-3 wk)
Web search (2-3 wks)
Advanced topics: CLIR, IE, ... (2 wks)
Term project presentation (2 wks)
scorePolicy:
Homework assignments and programming exercises: 40%
Mid-term exam: 25%
Final project or presentation: 35%
materials:
Textbook:
Christopher D. Manning, Prabhakar Raghavan and Hinrich Schuetze, Introduction to Information Retrieval, Cambridge University Press. 2008. (available online at: http://www.informationretrieval.org/)
References:
Ricardo Baeza-Yates and Berthier Ribeiro-Neto, Modern Information Retrieval, Addison-Wesley,1999.
Prerequisite:
Basic knowledge of data structures (and algorithms)
Programming experience is necessary for projects
